info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36484
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.republique-numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36484
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.republique-numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.republique-numerique.gouv.fr.	10800	IN	CNAME	webredir.vip.gandi.net.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
gandi.net.	1200	IN	SOA	dns0.gandi.net. hostmaster.gandi.net. 2023121400 900 900 1209600 1200

info.name: Missing Subresource Integrity
author: lucky0x0d
pulsesecurity.co.nz
info.description: Checks if script tags within the HTML response have Subresource Integrity implemented via the integrity attribute

request:

Host: www.republique-numerique.gouv.fr

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.republique-numerique.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 501 Unsupported method ('POST') Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html Date: Fri, 05 Jan 2024 07:39:08 GMT Server: nginx 501 Unsupported method ('POST')

Unsupported method ('POST')

Server does not support this operation
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: www.republique-numerique.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'http://www.republique-numerique.gouv.fr/'
